name: @instantquote/dashboard
description: Find and rank local service businesses for InstantQuote microform targeting

scripts.build:packages: npm run --workspace @instantquote/core build && npm run --workspace @instantquote/automation-showcase build && npm run --workspace @instantquote/lead-finder build
scripts.demo:automations: npm run build:packages && node apps/lead-finder/dist/cli.js automations demo --out-dir ./data/outputs/automation_showcase
